questiontext.text:
A car travles at a constant speed of 76 km per hour. It encounters a retarding force (rolling resistance, air ressitance etc) of 560 N.




At what power level does the engine deliver energy to the wheels to maintain the car's speed?

{1:NUMERICAL:=11.8:-94.1176#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again} kW

(Please give your answer correct to 1.d.p.)

(Question ID #1).
